p: As expected, there are very limited and less conclusive in vivo studies. Moreover, in many cases, the molecules used for in vivo studies were not tested for the presence of lipopolysaccharides or other pro-inflammatory molecules, which may bias the experimental design, particularly when directly infused in the mammary gland. Most in vivo studies, including the treatment with external application, do not provide enough scientific evidence to support the use of the EO directly in the mammary gland.
